item.title: [COLOR green][B]Arenavision channels Sports[/B][/COLOR]
item.regex:
makelist
<item><title> [COLOR skyblue] [makelist.param2][/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=Adryanlist + [makelist.param2]</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://arenavision.ru/[makelist.param1]</page> <referer>http://arenavision.ru</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <thumbnail>https://s1.postimg.org/rj8saq01b/image.jpg</thumbnail> </item>
href="\/(.*?)".*?>(A.*?)<href="/acestream1">AV 1-10< http://arenavision.ru/ Mozilla http://www.arenavision.ru beget=begetok

item.title: [COLOR yellow][B]* THI ĐẤU THỂ THAO QUỐC TẾ (xem theo giờ VN + 5 Tiếng)[/B][/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat:
<SetViewMode>55</SetViewMode> <title>[COLOR lightgreen][makelist.param1] [/COLOR] [COLOR deepskyblue][makelist.param2] [/COLOR][COLOR lightslategray][makelist.param3] [/COLOR] [COLOR skyblue][B][makelist.param5] [/B] [/COLOR][COLOR lightyellow] [makelist.param7] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightblue][[makelist.param4]] [/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=Adryanlist+[makelist.param5]+Arenavision</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://arenavision.us/$doregex[canal]</page> <referer>http://arenavision.us</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <regex> <name>canal</name> <expres>$pyFunction:'[makelist.param6]'.replace('>4','04').replace('>5','05').replace('>6','06').replace('>7','07').replace('>8','08').replace('>9','09').replace('>10','10').replace('>11','11').replace('>12','12').replace('>13','13').replace('>14','14').replace('>15','15').replace('>16','16').replace('>17','17').replace('>18','18').replace('>19','19').replace('>20','20').replace('>21','21').replace('>22','22').replace('>23','23').replace('>24','24').replace('>25','25').replace('>26','26').replace('>27','27').replace('>28','28').replace('>29','29').replace('>30','30').replace('>31','31').replace('>32','32').replace('>33','33').replace('>34','34').replace('>35','35').replace('>1','01').replace('>>2','02').replace('>3','03')</expres> <page></page> </regex>
<thumbnail>https://s1.postimg.org/rj8saq01b/image.jpg</thumbnail>

item.title: [COLOR lime]•[/COLOR][COLOR aquamarine] [B]BÓNG ĐÁ QUỐC TẾ[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR lightyellow] xem theo giờ VN + 5 tiếng [/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat:
<SetViewMode>55</SetViewMode> <title>[COLOR lightgreen][makelist.param1] [COLOR silver] [makelist.param2] [COLOR skyblue][makelist.param4][/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR] [COLOR deepskyblue] [makelist.param5][/COLOR] </title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=Adryanlist+[COLOR skyblue][makelist.param4][/COLOR]</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://arenavision2017.tk/$doregex[canal]</page> <referer>http://arenavision2017.tk/</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <regex> <name>canal</name> <expres>$pyFunction:'[makelist.param5]'.replace('>4','04').replace('>5','05').replace('>6','06').replace('>7','07').replace('>8','08').replace('>9','09').replace('>10','10').replace('>11','11').replace('>12','12').replace('>13','13').replace('>14','14').replace('>15','15').replace('>16','16').replace('>17','17').replace('>18','18').replace('>19','19').replace('>20','20').replace('>21','21').replace('>22','22').replace('>23','23').replace('>24','24').replace('>25','25').replace('>26','26').replace('>27','27').replace('>28','28').replace('>29','29').replace('>30','30').replace('>31','31').replace('>32','32').replace('>33','33').replace('>34','34').replace('>35','35').replace('>1','01').replace('>2','02').replace('>3','03')</expres> <page></page> </regex>
<thumbnail>http://adryanlist.org/adryan/img/acestreams.png</thumbnail> <fanart>http://adryanlist.org/adryan/img/fanart.jpg</fanart> <info>Adryanlist es GRATIS, pero funciona gracias a tus donaciones, para mantener las listas y el addon funcionando, es por ello que te pido tu apoyo realizando una pequeña donacion "VOLUNTARIA" mediante PAYPAL ya sea al correo adrian.bu@gmail.com o entrando directamente a la pagina http://paypal.me/adryanlist, Gracias a tus donaciones este proyecto seguira adelante</info> </item>

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Liga ', ['LA LIGA', 'LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'COPA DE ESPAÑA', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA']) lists = ['SPANISH LA LIGA', 'SPANISH LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'SPANISH CUP', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA'] return lists[ret]
